The game is good but the overall experience is bad. There are way too many cheaters and the anti cheat system is bad. I recently tracked all my matches and found out that every 10 games i play  i am matches with hackers in 6 matches. This shows that the anti cheat works but its way too sloww as the experience already spoiled.

I love this game but if the anti cheat system of the game is not improved then there is no way to continue with this game.
